main event: A witness observed a steady glowing light in the sky for 1 hour and 30 minutes on May 5, 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared as a steady glowing light at an elevation of 45 degrees in the northwest.
High clouds gave the appearance of the object being fuzzy.
The object was observed for a total duration of 30 seconds.
The witness estimated the object to be about a minute wide or more, much larger than the head of a match held at arm's length.
The witness drew a cone-shaped object with an upward pointing arrow to indicate the direction of movement.
sighted object: a steady glowing light in the sky
